input_email_body:
Subject: Syncing Issue

I am facing periodic syncing challenges, which might be related to network fluctuations. Despite restarting UniFi, verifying cable connections, and updating Ubuntu, the problem still exists and is intermittent, complicating its diagnosis. I would greatly appreciate your help in resolving this You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. Could you please request additional details from me to aid in troubleshooting? My name is Elena Ivanova.
